text: maṉitarkaḷ ceyyum akkiramaṅkaḷukkāka allāh avarkaḷai uṭaṉukkuṭaṉ piṭi(ttut taṇṭi)ppatāka iruntāl uyirppirāṇikaḷil oṉṟaiyumē pūmiyil viṭṭu vaikka māṭṭāṉ; āṉāl, oru kuṟippiṭṭa tavaṇai varai avarkaḷai(p piṭikkātu) piṟpaṭuttukiṟāṉ - avarkaḷuṭaiya tavaṇai vantu viṭṭālō oru kaṇamēṉum (taṇṭaṉai peṟuvatil) avarkaḷ pintavum māṭṭārkaḷ; muntavum māṭṭārkaḷ
